definition[0]: to move slowly or take too long doing something
example[0]: Come on, we haven’t got time to hang about!
definition[1]: to spend time somewhere without any real purpose
example[1]: There were always groups of boys hanging about in the square.
example[2]: He normally hung about the house all day.
definition[2]: used to ask someone to wait or stop what they are doing
definition[3]: used when you have just noticed or thought of something that is interesting or wrong
example[3]: Hang about – that can’t be right.
